title: Logging issue

replies.body:
Hey there,

Apologies for the delayed response.

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5) for me, let me know if this helps at all.

Hey SephirothSG, 

Tried switching to a public DNS, still hangs at "logging on" when using my optus wifi stick- Switch to my slow and terribly bad ethernet connection (not with optus) and i'm able to log on instantly. Any insights?
I'm also having this issue. Hopefully it will be addressed soon.
